org.apache.commons.math4.linear

Class InverseHilbertMatrix

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.commons.math4.linear.RealLinearOperator
      • org.apache.commons.math4.linear.InverseHilbertMatrix

  • public class InverseHilbertMatrix
extends RealLinearOperator
    This class implements inverses of Hilbert Matrices as RealLinearOperator.

        Returns the dimension of the domain of this operator.
        Specified by:
        getColumnDimension in class RealLinearOperator

        the number of columns of the underlying matrix

      • getEntry

        public long getEntry(int i,
                     int j)
        Returns the (i, j) entry of the inverse Hilbert matrix. Exact arithmetic is used; in case of overflow, an exception is thrown.
        Parameters:
        i - Row index (starts at 0).
        j - Column index (starts at 0).
        Returns:
        The coefficient of the inverse Hilbert matrix.

      • getRowDimension

        public int getRowDimension()
        Returns the dimension of the codomain of this operator.

        Returns:
        the number of rows of the underlying matrix

        Parameters:
        x - the vector to operate on
        Returns:
        the product of this instance with x
